actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating the period from July 5, 1976, through July 10, 1976, as "National Synchronized Swimming Week."

summary.text: Authorizes the President to issue a proclamation designating the period from July 5, 1976, through July 10, 1976, as "National Synchronized Swimming Week."

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating the period from July 5, 1976, through July 10, 1976, as "National Synchronized Swimming Week."
